name: Noi (londortz)
description:
[Spanish]

Sigue la historia de Gabriel, un aburrido profesor de secundaria y su estudiante Jennifer, una chica delincuente.

[English]

At the moment, there is no English translation. If you want to translate the game into English, you can contact me by DM on twitter: @londortz

Art, Story by Andrew Londortz

Backgrounds School by Neeka

Backgrounds Suburban by kastin-humeyrow
